p: The sorption temperature only had a little effect on the adsorption data. Table 4 indicates the estimated parameters and comparison statistics for seven models. The results are similar to those of C. morifolium flowers. The Chung-Pfost, Halsey, Oswin, White & Eirig and GAB equations had lower R 2 and higher value for s, MRE and PRESS. The residual plots all presented a systematic pattern.
